items.name: The North Face Kaiju Four-Person Tent
items.description: With its roomy interior height and easy-pitch, three-pole design, The North Face Kaiju Four-Person Tent meets the needs of campers who want convenience and all the technical advantages to be found in a North Face design.

items.name: Cabela's Mountain Trapper 0°F Sleeping Bag
items.description: Constructed to keep you warm through temperatures as low as 0°F, Cabela's Mountain Trapper Sleeping Bag is perfect for camping spring through fall.

items.name: Slumberjack Forest 0°F Sleeping Bag
items.description: Durable construction with a draft tube along the anti-snag zipper to keep cold air out and warm air in. High-loft, heat-trapping Slumberloft™ synthetic insulation.

items.name: Garmin® Rino 650 GPS Radio
items.description: With the navigational capabilities of a 12-parallel-channel GPS and the reliable communication power of a 22-channel GMRS/FRS radio, this 100% waterproof GPS/radio units let you travel anywhere with complete confidence.

items.name: Garmin® Oregon® 600T
items.description: Simply tap your finger on the brightly colored, easy-to-read, 3" touch-screen display and explore like never before.

items.name: Landmann Patio Lights Deer Fire Pit
items.description: Upgrade your patio or campsite with the unique ambiance of a flickering fire glowing through deer and track cutouts with Landmann's Patio Lights Deer Fire Pit.
